Introduction

MAVE: is a virtual girl group created by Metaverse Entertainment. Their debut single album, “Pandora’s Box”, was released on January 25, 2023, with the title track "Pandora". The group consists of four virtual members: SIU:, ZENA:, TYRA: and MARTY:.

The members of MAVE: was created using a combination of 3D rendering and deepfake technology. Both group names and member names are styled using a colon (:).
